column4: I'm having trouble with my sound, i tried updating to the latest version of ALSA for my RealTek driver, but the utils didnt install correctly, now i have no sound and my gstream.plugins ugly are not working
not to mention my emerald is no longer working..
should i just reformat and start from scratch?
emerald has issues.. no you don't need to reformat and reinstall..  /join #ubuntu-effects and ask there.. you should be able to just uninstall emerald and restart X to get back to normal.
its not only emerald, its also my sound card and my video card, not to mention gstream ugly plugins have stopped working :S
did all that just start to happen at once..?
well.. first I'd uninstall emerald and get back to the gtk default theme.. then reconfigure x using the line mentioned in the top part of /etc/xorg.conf.. after that see if it works.
i uninstalled emerald, then tried a sudo gedit command on xorg.conf and it came up blank
gksudo gedit /etc/xorg.conf
ah.. sorry  gksudo /ext/X11/xorg.conf  I always forget the X11 part.. :(
no biggie, and u mean take the sudo command thats in # in that file?
hang on.. I'm looking
was I typing gksudo /etc/X11/xorg.conf or /etx?  it should be etc
don't forget to add gedit in there too.
my bad as they say..
yes
its giving me a warning and it looks like its not proceding overwriting possibly-customised configuration
do you have the propiatory driver loaded for your vid card?
im not sure what u mean
do you have the "effects" enabled for cube and rotate etc?
well it was working to some degree before so i think yes, but now emerald is uninstalled so
: np
